field.name: description
field.value:
The Transcriptionist enters diagnoses for one or more Pathologists. They are typically handed a piece of paper with the Pathologist's notes, enter in the information, print a report that the Pathologist reviews, and closes the case after the Pathologist okays the report.

We should essentially steal the Pathologist shell vm for starts.
They will need a search box for cases and a drop-down of Pathologists to select for whom they are entering the diagnosis.
Upon selecting a case, they will need a list of slide diagnoses, followed by the case diagnoses.
They will need to be able to:
 - Save the case
 - Print, Save, etc. the Report (identical to what is currently at Pathologist)
 - As a secondary task (for us), they should be able to edit case demographics (e.g. add a mouse strain, if one was not entered at Accession)
